mapper.select: SELECT nMovieSeq, sMovieTitle, sMovieStory, sMovieImage, dtOpeningDate, sMovieDirector FROM tMovieList ORDER BY dtOpeningDate DESC LIMIT #{startNum}, 10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM tMovieList
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tMovieList ( sMovieTitle, sMovieStory, sMovieImage, dtOpeningDate, sMovieDirector, sGenreId ) VALUES ( #{sMovieTitle}, #{sMovieStory}, #{sMovieImage}, #{dtOpeningDate}, #{sMovieDirector}, #{sGenreId} )
mapper.select: SELECT sMovieTitle, sMovieStory, sMovieImage, dtOpeningDate, sMovieDirector FROM tMovieList WHERE nMovieSeq = #{nMovieSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE tMovieList SET sMovieTitle = #{sMovieTitle}, sMovieStory = #{sMovieStory}, dtOpeningDate = #{dtOpeningDate}, sMovieDirector = #{sMovieDirector}, sGenreId = #{sGenreId} WHERE nMovieSeq = #{nMovieSeq}
